name: Half-Elf
languages: One extra language of your choice

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

traits.name: Skill Versatility
traits.description: You gain proficiency in two skills of your choice.

alignment: Half-elves share the chaotic bent of their elven heritage. They value both personal freedom and creative expression.
sizeDescription: Half-elves are about the same size as humans, ranging from 5 to 6 feet tall.
